# Marko

> Marko is a superset of well-formed HTML that makes building web applications fun and productive. It combines HTML with JavaScript syntax features and introduces reactivity for building high-performance web applications with rich client interactions.

Marko's key features include:
- Streaming and high throughput rendering
- Built-in progressive rendering and resumability
- Fine-grained reactivity system
- HTML-based syntax with granular JavaScript integration
- TypeScript support with full type checking
- Zero-JS-by-default with sub-component partial hydration

## Full Documentation
- [Reference Documentation](https://markojs.com/docs/llms/reference-full.md): Official documentation site for Marko

## Core Documentation

- [Why Choose Marko](https://markojs.com/docs/llms/why-marko.md): Performance benefits, developer experience, and core principles
- [Language Reference](https://markojs.com/docs/llms/language.md): Complete language syntax and features documentation
- [Core Tags](https://markojs.com/docs/llms/core-tag.md): Built-in Marko tags and their functionality
- [Native Tags](https://markojs.com/docs/llms/native-tag.md): How HTML tags work in Marko
- [Custom Tags](https://markojs.com/docs/llms/custom-tag.md): Creating and using custom components
- [Reactivity](https://markojs.com/docs/llms/reactivity.md): Understanding Marko's reactive system
- [TypeScript Support](https://markojs.com/docs/llms/typescript.md): Using TypeScript with Marko
- [Template API](https://markojs.com/docs/llms/template.md): API reference for Marko templates

## Guides

- [Getting Started](https://markojs.com/docs/llms/run/getting-started.md): Quick start guide for new projects
- [Styling](https://markojs.com/docs/llms/styling.md): Guide to styling in Marko applications
- [File-based Routing](https://markojs.com/docs/llms/run/file-based-routing.md): How routing works in Marko applications
- [Concise Syntax](https://markojs.com/docs/llms/concise-syntax.md): Alternative compact syntax for Marko templates

## Optional

- [TypeScript Configuration](https://markojs.com/docs/llms/run/typescript.md): Detailed TypeScript setup and configuration
